record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, MAY 22, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, MAY 22, 2008 -- (Senate - May 21, 2008)

[Page: S4707]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9:30 a.m. tomorrow, May 22; that following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved, and the Senate resume consideration of the House message to accompany H.R. 2641, the supplemental appropriations bill, as under the previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
